display.title: Cliffs of Moher
display.description:
This has to be the most windy but visited place in Ireland. 60 kilometers from Galway, the cliffs are raising from the ocean and are not a good place for people who are afraid of hights.

200 meters from the cliffs there is a visitor centre, where you can eat and basically hide from the wind. There is also a parking lot, that is free.
